title: test signup api with valid and invalid data
description: Verify the /api/auth/signup endpoint correctly validates input data and creates a pending token on valid signup requests, and returns validation errors for invalid data.

title: test login api with correct and incorrect credentials
description: Verify the /api/auth/login endpoint allows login with valid email/username and password, and returns 401 for invalid credentials.

title: test logout api clears session
description: Verify the /api/auth/logout endpoint successfully logs out the user and clears the session data.

title: test csrf token api returns token cookie
description: Verify the /api/auth/csrf-token endpoint returns a valid CSRF token cookie for use in subsequent requests.

title: test payment initialization with valid and invalid data
description: Verify the /api/payment/initialize endpoint initializes payments correctly with valid data and returns validation errors for invalid requests.

title: test payment verification by reference
description: Verify the /api/payment/verify endpoint correctly verifies payments by reference and returns success or failure accordingly.

title: test inventory list by store
description: Verify the /api/stores/{storeId}/inventory endpoint returns the correct inventory list for the specified store.

title: test offline sync upload batch
description: Verify the /api/sync/upload endpoint correctly accepts and processes offline batch data uploads.

title: test observability health check
description: Verify the /api/observability/health endpoint returns accurate system health status including database latency and service availability.

title: test customer creation and search by phone
description: Verify the /api/customers endpoint allows creating a new customer and searching customers by phone within the organization scope.
